item.title: Operations Research
item.description: Introduction Operations Research is the application of advanced analytical methods to enable better decision making. A plethora of problems may be solved using Operations Research; among these are Determining the route a delivery truck should take in order to make all deliveries while traveling the fewest number of miles. Determining the best location for a new facility such as a fire station. Scheduling airline flights and crew. Determining the optimal distribution of bicycles in a bike sharing system.
